item.title: 债务忧虑减弱，斯里兰卡股市飙升寻求外资推动
item.description: 斯里兰卡股票今年在亚洲表现最佳，涨幅高达 53%，在此之前，斯里兰卡正努力促进外资参与岛国股票市场。【原文：Sri Lanka is seeking to boost foreign participation in the island nation’s shares after a 53% rally put local shares among Asia’s top performers this year.】

item.title: 救援人员从阿塞拜疆坠机事故中找到 38 具尸体和录音机
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦当局称，在阿塞拜疆航空公司一架巴西航空工业公司 SA 190 飞机坠毁现场，救援队已找到 38 具尸体，清理工作仍在继续。【原文：Kazakh authorities said that a rescue team has recovered 38 bodies at the crash site of Azerbaijan Airlines’ Embraer SA 190 aircraft as clean-up efforts continue.】

item.title: 安哥拉领导人赦免51人，包括前任之子TikToker
item.description: 安哥拉总统若昂-卢伦科赦免了51名囚犯，其中包括他前任总统的儿子。【原文：Angolan President Joao Lourenco pardoned 51 prisoners, including the son of his predecessor who was convicted to five years in jail for his alleged role in siphoning $500 million from the country.】

item.title: 中国金融、地产企业员工人数首次出现缩减
item.description: 近年来，中国金融和房地产公司的员工人数首次出现缩减，这反映了房地产市场崩溃和监管调查所造成的损失。【原文：China’s finance and property companies saw their workforces shrink in recent years years for the first time, reflecting the damage caused by a housing market collapse and regulatory probes.】

item.title: Telegram 和腾讯开始申请马来西亚许可证
item.description: 据马来西亚通讯与多媒体委员会称，Telegram 和腾讯控股有限公司的微信已开始办理在马来西亚运营其平台所需的许可证。【原文：Telegram and Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s WeChat have begun the process to obtain licenses needed to operate their platforms in Malaysia, according to the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission.】

item.title: 韩国反对党提出弹劾代总统的动议
item.description: 韩国反对党提出了弹劾代总统韩德洙的动议，因为他抵制了任命法院法官的压力，而这些法官可能会增加尹硕烈总统下台的可能性。【原文：South Korea’s opposition party filed a motion to impeach Acting President Han Duck-soo after he resisted pressure to appoint court judges who might increase the likelihood of removing President Yoon Suk Yeol from power.】

item.title: 詹妮弗-格兰霍尔姆谈拜登能源遗产的存续问题
item.description:
能源转型的政治持久性。【原文：

The political durability of the energy transition.

】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 "成本切割机 "正在为 DOGE 工作
item.description:
从酸奶店经营者到隧道工程执行官，马斯克的长期雇员史蒂夫-戴维斯（Steve Davis）正在将他与众不同的才能带到政府部门。【原文：

From yogurt store operator to tunneling executive, longtime Musk employee Steve Davis is bringing his unusual talents to the government. 

】

item.title: 奇货可居：詹妮弗-格兰霍尔姆谈拜登的能源遗产（播客）
item.description: 拜登政府将能源和气候问题作为政府工作的核心，其中最引人注目的是《通货膨胀削减法案》。与此同时，在过去四年中，我们看到美国石油和天然气生产蓬勃发展，同时，战略石油储备作为稳定价格和供应的工具也得到了新的利用。与此同时，从与中国的战略和经济竞争的角度来看，对电池和其他清洁技术的投资被认为是至关重要的。那么【原文：The Biden administration made energy and climate a centerpiece of its administration, most notably through the Inflation Reduction Act. At the same time, we’ve seen a boom in US oil and gas production the last four years, alongside the novel use of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve as a price and supply stabilization tool. Meanwhile, investments in batteries and other clean technologies have been framed as crucial from the perspective of strategic and economic competition with China. So what was a】

item.title: 莫桑比克发生骚乱和越狱事件，248 人丧生，企业蒙受损失
item.description: 在莫桑比克不断升级的选举后动乱中，至少有 248 人丧生，而致命的骚乱促使一家天然气生产商限制向邻国南非发货，并促使特斯拉公司的一家供应商关闭业务。【原文：At least 248 people have died in Mozambique’s escalating post-election turmoil while the deadly unrest prompted a natural gas producer to restrict shipping to neighboring South Africa and a Tesla Inc. supplier to shut operations.】

item.title: 赞比亚 12 月通胀率升至三年新高
item.description: 由于赞比亚遭受了一个多世纪以来最严重的旱灾，加上克瓦查币持续疲软，刺激了物价上涨，赞比亚的年通货膨胀率在12月份连续第18个月攀升。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation rate climbed for an 18th month December as the nation’s worst drought in more than a century and the kwacha’s continued weakness stoked prices.】

item.title: 伊拉克计划明年将天然气燃烧量减少至 20%，以减少进口
item.description: 伊拉克是欧佩克第二大石油生产国，它正计划明年将非生产性燃烧的天然气量减少到 20%左右，以满足不断增长的需求并减少进口。【原文：Iraq, OPEC’s second-largest oil producer, is planning to cut the amount of gas it burns off unproductively to about 20% next year in an attempt to meet rising demand and reduce imports.】

item.title: 泰国央行预计 2026 年通胀率在 1%至 3%之间
item.description: 泰国央行行长塞萨布-素提瓦特那鲁普（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）表示，泰国央行预计未来两年的通胀率将保持在 1%至 3%的目标区间内，并认为这一区间是适当的，有利于国家的增长潜力。【原文：Bank of Thailand expects inflation to stay within the 1% to 3% target range in the next two years, Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput said, describing the band as appropriate and supportive of the nation’s growth potential.】

item.title: 据称阿里巴巴接近与韩国 E-Mart 达成 40 亿美元交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）即将达成一项交易，将其韩国业务与 E-Mart Inc.【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is nearing a deal to merge its South Korean operations with E-Mart Inc.’s e-commerce platform to better compete in the country’s fast-paced online retail sector, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 即使通胀略有缓解，埃及仍将保持创纪录的通胀率
item.description: 埃及可能会将利率维持在创纪录的高位，以确保通胀持续放缓，然后再开始实施 2020 年以来的首次货币宽松政策。【原文：Egypt will probably hold interest rates at a record high, seeking to ensure inflation keeps slowing before embarking on its first monetary easing since 2020.】

item.title: 被制裁的俄罗斯液化天然气船历时四个月寻找买家未果
item.description: 一艘载有受制裁的俄罗斯液化天然气货物的船只似乎正在将这些燃料卸载到该国远东地区的仓库中，尽管经过四个月的环球航行，这艘船仍未能找到愿意规避美国限制的买家。【原文：A vessel carrying a sanctioned shipment of Russian liquefied natural gas appears to be offloading the fuel into storage in the nation’s far east, having failed to find a buyer willing to circumvent US restrictions despite a four-month, across-the-world journey.】

item.title: 比特币因微策略公司计划发行更多股票而上涨
item.description: 比特币周四上涨，因为数字资产储存商微策略公司（MicroStrategy）宣布了一项发行更多股票的计划，此举将使其能够购买更多代币。【原文：Bitcoin rose on Thursday after the digital asset’s stockpiler MicroStrategy announced a plan to issue more shares, a move that would allow it to buy even more tokens.】

item.title: 钢厂冬季补货，铁矿石收复部分损失
item.description: 铁矿石走高，原因是中国钢厂在春季恢复生产活动前备货。【原文：Iron ore ticked higher as Chinese steel mills stock up ahead of activity resuming in the spring.】

item.title: 一月不景气并不意味着印度股市今年会一蹶不振
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本零售业和旅游业股票因与中国签订旅游协议而上涨
item.description: 在日本政府与中国达成一致，推出更多措施促进两国之间的旅游往来后，日本零售业和旅游业相关股票上涨。【原文：Japan’s retail and tourism-related shares gained after the government agreed with China to introduce more measures to promote travel between the two countries.】

item.title: 价格大幅波动后中国首次推出多晶硅期货
item.description: 中国首个多晶硅期货于本周四首次亮相，为这个一直在价格大幅波动中挣扎的市场提供了新的套期保值工具。【原文：China’s first polysilicon futures debuted on Thursday, as a new hedging tool for a market that has been struggling with massive price volatility.】

item.title: 日本将公布创纪录的预算案，增加国防开支
item.description: 预计日本政府将于周五批准下一财年创纪录的初步预算，该预算将增加国防开支和对地区经济的支持。【原文：The Japanese government is expected to approve a record initial budget Friday for the next fiscal year that will ramp up spending on defense and support for regional economies.】

item.title: CEBR 表示：未来 15 年英国经济表现将优于欧洲
item.description: 根据长期预测，在未来 15 年内，英国的经济表现将优于陷入困境的欧洲同行，这将有助于英国继续保持其在世界最大经济体中的地位。【原文：The UK will outperform its struggling European peers in the next 15 years, helping it to cling onto its place among the world’s biggest economies, according to long-term projections.】

item.title: 亚洲股市开盘后交投清淡：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘后走势平淡，多个地区市场仍因假期休市。周二美股延续了今年以来的涨势，市场情绪可能保持积极。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a muted open with several regional markets still shut for holidays. Sentiment may remain positive after US shares extended this year’s gains on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国经济刺激和美国库存成为焦点，石油保持升势
item.description: 石油在周二上涨后趋于稳定，中国的刺激措施和美国的库存前景成为关注焦点。【原文：Oil steadied after an advance on Tuesday, with China’s stimulus measures and the outlook for US stockpiles in focus.】

item.title: 中国寻求通过给予地方官员债券回旋余地来刺激经济增长
item.description: 中国正在允许地方官员利用一种重要的政府债券投资更多领域，同时简化审批程序，以期更好地利用这一重要的公共资金来源推动经济发展。【原文：China is allowing local officials to invest in more areas with a key government bond while also simplifying its approval process in a bid to make better use of an important source of public funding to drive the economy.】

item.title: 诺瓦克称俄罗斯可通过多条路线向欧洲输送天然气
item.description: 俄罗斯副总理亚历山大-诺瓦克（Alexander Novak）说，俄罗斯准备继续通过几条路线向欧洲出口天然气，因为经乌克兰转运燃料的合同预计将于今年结束。【原文：Russia is ready to continue gas exports to Europe through several routes just as a contract to transit the fuel via Ukraine is expected to end this year, Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚最大银行通过配售融资 2.28 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚资产规模最大的银行 Access Bank Plc 在开始实施扩张计划之际，通过供股募集了 3510 亿奈拉（2.28 亿美元）的资金，使其资本金超过了新的监管门槛。【原文：Access Bank Plc, Nigeria biggest lender by assets, raised 351 billion naira ($228 million) in a rights offer to boost its capital above a new regulatory threshold as it embarks on an expansion plan.】

item.title: 华尔街对土耳其可能数年来首次降息看法不一
item.description: 土耳其央行预计将于本周四进行近两年来的首次降息，各大银行对降息幅度存在分歧。【原文：Turkey’s central bank is expected to deliver its first interest rate cut in nearly two years on Thursday, with major banks divided on the size of the reduction.】

item.title: 前喜剧演员与前高盛分析师联手为日本股票基金提供建议
item.description: 一位前喜剧演员和一位前高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A former comedian and an ex-Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analyst will offer investment advice for a Japanese equity fund that’s set to launch in January.】
